quote: A beautiful country is a dream-like an illusion. It is senseless to cling to it. Unless the inner forces of negative emotions are conquered, strife with outer enemies will never end.
quote_letters: A BEAUTIFUL COUNTRY IS A DREAM-LIKE AN ILLUSION IT IS SENSELESS TO CLING TO IT UNLESS THE INNER FORCES OF NEGATIVE EMOTIONS ARE CONQUERED STRIFE WITH OUTER ENEMIES WILL NEVER END
